sentences.sContent: I know that this draft text will need to be edited.
sentences.sCn: 我知道这篇草稿需要校订。

sentences.sContent: a collection of essays edited by John Gay
sentences.sCn: 由约翰·盖伊编辑的论文集

sentences.sContent: He taught me to edit and splice film.

words.tran: 以编辑身份地；以社论形式
编者，编辑；社论撰写人；编辑装置
编辑；校订；编辑或主笔地位

trans.tranOther: to prepare a book, piece of film etc for printing or broadcasting by removing mistakes or parts that are not acceptable
